entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is introduced as a character who is whispering to Harry through the dark. He is described as having a conversation with Harry about what to do with the men who had jeered at Hermione earlier.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is introduced as a character who is conversing with Ron through the dark. He is described as having a conversation with Ron about what to do with the men who had jeered at Hermione earlier.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is introduced as a character who shudders and takes a step backward when Ron suggests killing the men. She is described as having knowledge of the theory behind the Memory Charm.

entities.name: dolohov
entities.description: Dolohov is introduced as one of the men who had jeered at Hermione earlier. He is described as having his memories wiped by Hermione using the Obliviate spell.

entities.name: café
entities.description: The café is introduced as a location where Harry, Ron, and Hermione are hiding. It is described as being plunged into darkness by Ron using the Deluminator.

relationships.description: Ron and Harry are having a conversation through the dark about what to do with the men who had jeered at Hermione earlier. Ron is whispering to Harry, and they are discussing whether to kill or wipe the memories of the men.
Harry and Hermione are having a conversation about the Memory Charm. Harry is explaining that they need to wipe the memories of the men, and Hermione is agreeing with him.

Harry and Ron are having a conversation about what to do with the men who had jeered at Hermione earlier. Harry is explaining that they need to wipe the memories of the men, and Ron is agreeing with him.
Hermione uses the Obliviate spell to wipe the memories of Dolohov. She points her wand at his forehead and says 'Obliviate', causing his eyes to become unfocused and dreamy.
